ANU.name: Serena (Chen) Hamilton
ANU.biography: Serena is a research fellow in the area of water resources management and socio-environmental systems modelling. Her research has focussed on integrated assessment and modelling for improving understanding of system linkages and management of environmental resources and assets. She completed her PhD at the Fenner School of Environment & Society, ANU in 2013.
